s.text: This slogan is part of a new multimillion-dollar campaign--to persuade whom to do what?
This would be great for the country but tough on "News Quiz," already perilously low on favorite targets.
Consider cartoons: Tom needs Jerry, Bugs needs Elmer, J. Edgar Hoover needs decent Americans exercising their political freedoms.
